**[GreenCloudVPS.com](https://greencloudvps.com/)**
More than 16,000 active clients from over 150 countries around the world choose us, you can count on us too!

[Like us on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greencloudvps)
[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/GreenCloudVPS)

**Why Us?**

- We have been in hosting business since 2013 with years of experience.
- Owned enterprise hardware: We own all our hardware and network equipment. We do not use consumer grade hardware, only trusted enterprise hardware from: Supermicro, Dell, Intel, Samsung & Western Digital
- Fast ticket response with average of 20 mins.
- 24x7 In-house Professional Support
- 99.9% Network Uptime Guaranteed
- 1Gbps and 10Gbps Network Connection
- 7 day money back guarantee

Test IPs: https://greencloudvps.com/data-centers.php
